meta.title: Caution Zone | Dino Run Run
meta.description: Important disclaimers and information about the Dino Run Run game.

sections.title: Age Appropriateness
sections.description: Dino Run Run is designed for players of all ages, but we recommend parental guidance for children under 8 years old. The game contains mild cartoon violence as dinosaurs navigate obstacles and avoid predators.
items: No graphic content or realistic depictions of violence
Parental guidance recommended for younger players

sections.title: Health and Safety
sections.description: As with any video game, please take regular breaks to avoid eye strain and maintain physical well-being. We recommend playing in a well-lit room and maintaining proper posture.
items: Take a 15-minute break for every hour of gameplay
Discontinue play if you experience dizziness, nausea, or discomfort
sections.highlight: If you have a history of photosensitive epilepsy or seizures, please consult a doctor before playing Dino Run Run.

sections.title: In-App Purchases
sections.description: Dino Run Run offers optional in-app purchases that enhance gameplay but are not required to enjoy the core game experience. These purchases may include cosmetic items, additional dinosaur species, and convenience features.
items: All core gameplay features are available without additional purchase
Parental controls are available to restrict purchases
No advertisements are shown to players who have made any purchase

sections.title: Online Interactions
sections.description: Dino Run Run includes online features such as leaderboards and tournaments. We are committed to providing a safe environment for all players, but online interactions are not rated by the ESRB.
items: Username and profile picture are visible to other players
No direct messaging or chat features are included
Leaderboards display usernames and scores only
Report inappropriate usernames through our support system
sections.highlight: Remember to use appropriate usernames and never share personal information through your profile.
